tables.title: TYPICAL JACK INSTALLATION SHOWN
headers: DISTANCE BETWEEN JACKING/SAFETY POINTS AND THE GROUND - L (FORWARD JACK)
DISTANCE BETWEEN JACKING/SAFETY POINTS AND THE GROUND - M (WING JACK)
DISTANCE BETWEEN JACKING/SAFETY POINTS AND THE GROUND - N (SAFETY STAY)
rows:
- NLG SHOCK ABSORBER DEFLATED AND NLG TIRES FLAT
- MLG STANDARD TIRES, WITH STANDARD SHOCK ABSORBERS

- AIRCRAFT ON JACKS (FORWARD JACK AND WING JACKS)
- FUSELAGE DATUM LINE PARALLEL TO THE GROUND

STANDARD TIRES
MLG SHOCK ABSORBERS EXTENDED WITH WHEEL CLEARANCE OF 120 mm (4.72 in) FOR MLG RETRACTION OR EXTENSION

- AIRCRAFT ON JACKS (FORWARD JACK AND WING JACKS)
- FUSELAGE DATUM LINE PARALLEL TO THE GROUND

STANDARD TIRES
MLG SHOCK ABSORBERS EXTENDED WITH WHEEL CLEARANCE OF 770 mm (30.31 in) FOR REPLACEMENT OF THE MLG

- AIRCRAFT ON FORWARD JACK
- MLG WHEELS ON THE GROUND

STANDARD TIRES
NLG SHOCK ABSORBERS EXTENDED WITH WHEEL CLEARANCE OF 60 mm (2.36 in) FOR NLG RETRACTION OR EXTENSION
